data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_5e7b297af7c6e32a420b897aa4998071.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Silvanna's Basic Attacks deal 25<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.
Silvanna's attacks apply a mark on enemy heroes for 5s on hit, each mark reducing their Physical & Magic Defense by 3-6 (up to 5 stacks).
Silvanna's skills and Basic Attacks deal 30% extra damage to enemy heroes with the max number of marks.

Silvanna dashes forward. Upon reaching the max range or hitting a non-Minion enemy, she swings her lance, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stunning them for 1s.

Silvanna thrusts her lance in the target direction and spins it 6 times while gaining a 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> shield. Each spin deals 165<font color="62f8fe"> (+45% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slightly pulls targets toward the center. Silvanna spins 1 additional time for every 50% of extra Attack Speed she possesses.

The skill deals only 50% damage against Minions.

<font color="a6aafb">Spiral Strangling</font> counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.

Silvanna leaps to the target location and creates a Circle of Light upon landing, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area, slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, and restraining the closest enemy hero to the area for 3.5s. (This skill cannot be interrupted.)

Silvanna gains 100% Attack Speed and 40% Lifesteal when in the Circle.

data.name: Silvanna

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Powerful burst and Lifesteal. Great for finishing enemies off with Ultimate + blink.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
equiplist.equipskill2: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Magic Power
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Hybrid Lifesteal
+70 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Adaptive Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: SLEEPY
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Princess of the Moniyan Empire and queen regent.

assist.desc:
Pairing Silvanna with Tanks gives her sufficient space to dish out damage.
For example, Atlas and Tigreal.

strong.desc: Silvanna has a long attack range and powerful crowd control abilities,which makes her stronger against back-row Mages and Marksmen,such as Layla and Valir.

weak.desc:
But she can be weak against Fighters with multiple CCs
like Martis because they can easily interrupt her 2nd Skill.
